attributes.action: Call on those who voted Remain to respect democracy and the referendum result.
attributes.additional_details:
A football game would not be re-played if one side won 1-0 in the dying moments.  An Olympic race would not be re-run if one sprinter passed the finish line a fraction of a second before another.  

Sometimes, one just has to accept that one lost the contest.

We do not live in a true democracy if we do not respect the result of democratic processes.
attributes.background: A petition seeks to overturn the result of the lawful and democratic EU referendum.  That petition is an affront to democracy.  I call upon the official Remain campaign to insist ALL citizens respect the referendum result and work together to achieve the best outcome for the UK as we leave the EU.
